alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 01 at 3:22PM EDT until November 02 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Northwest Suffolk, Northeast Suffolk, Southwest Suffolk and Southeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk
